text: Phou-oibi, the rice goddess is a 2013 Meitei language ballad opera. It was performed by the Laihui Ensemble of Manipur. It was as a part of "Tapestry Sacred Music 2013", held at an esplanade in Singapore. It is based on the story of Phouoibi, the goddess of bounty in Meitei mythology and religion. It was composed and directed by Mayanglambam Mangangsana. == References == Category:Opera
title: Phou-oibi, the rice goddess
